title: User Registration and Login Setup
description: As a customer, I want to securely register and log in so that I can access my banking services online.
attributes_and_rules: The system must support secure registration and login procedures.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am a new customer, When I visit the registration page, Then I can create a new account securely.
test_cases: Given a new customer, When they visit the registration page, Then the customer account is created securely.

title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication
description: As a customer, I want to verify my login using an additional layer such as OTP or biometric verification so that my account remains secure.
attributes_and_rules: The system must support multiple MFA methods such as OTP, email verification, and biometric authentication.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am a logged-in customer, When I am prompted for MFA, Then I can successfully verify my identity with a second factor.
test_cases: Given a logged-in customer, When they are prompted for MFA, Then the customer successfully verifies their identity using the selected MFA method.

title: Password Recovery Functionality
description: As a customer, I want a secure password reset option so that I can recover my access when necessary.
attributes_and_rules: The system must provide secure and easy-to-use password recovery options.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am a customer who forgot my password, When I click on the password recovery link, Then I am guided through a secure password reset process.
test_cases: Given a customer who forgot their password, When they click on the password recovery link, Then the password reset process is completed securely.

title: Responsive Portal Layout
description: As a customer, I want the portal to adjust to my screen size so that I can easily use it on any device.
attributes_and_rules: The portal must automatically adjust its layout to fit different screen sizes including desktop, tablet, and mobile.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am a customer, When I access the portal on any device, Then the layout adjusts to fit the screen size.
test_cases: Given a customer, When they access the portal on a desktop, tablet, or mobile device, Then the layout adjusts accordingly.

title: Intuitive Navigation System
description: As a customer, I want an easy and intuitive navigation system so that I can quickly find the services I need.
attributes_and_rules: The navigation system must be intuitive and allow customers to quickly find services.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am a customer, When I navigate the portal, Then I can easily find the services I need.
test_cases: Given a customer, When they navigate the portal, Then they can quickly and easily find the needed services.

title: Display Personalized Account Information
description: As a customer, I want to view my personalized account summary so that I can easily monitor my banking activities.
attributes_and_rules: Personalized account information must be securely displayed.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am a logged-in customer, When I visit my dashboard, Then I see my personalized account summary.
test_cases: Given a logged-in customer, When they visit the dashboard, Then the personalized account summary is correctly displayed.

title: Recommend Eligible Products
description: As a customer, I want to see eligible banking products based on my profile so that I can explore relevant services.
attributes_and_rules: Product recommendations must be relevant and personalized based on customer's profile.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am a logged-in customer, When I visit my dashboard, Then I see recommendations for eligible banking products.
test_cases: Given a logged-in customer, When they visit the dashboard, Then the relevant eligible products are displayed.

title: Online Account Opening
description: As a customer, I want to open an account online so that I do not have to visit a branch.
attributes_and_rules: Account opening must be available online with minimal steps.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am a new customer, When I complete the online account opening process, Then my new account is created without needing to visit a branch.
test_cases: Given a new customer, When they complete the online account opening process, Then the new account is successfully created.

title: Service Modification Requests
description: As a customer, I want to modify my existing banking services online so that I can manage changes conveniently.
attributes_and_rules: Service modification must be user-friendly and conveniently accessible online.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am a logged-in customer, When I request to modify a service, Then I am able to complete and submit the modification online.
test_cases: Given a logged-in customer, When they request to modify a service, Then the modification is successfully submitted online.

title: Save and Resume Applications
description: As a customer, I want to save partially completed applications so that I can return to them later without losing my progress.
attributes_and_rules: Partially completed applications must be saved and retrievable.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am a customer, When I partially complete an application and save it, Then I can resume from where I left off at a later time.
test_cases: Given a customer, When they partially complete and save an application, Then the application is properly saved and recoverable.

title: Display Real-Time Application Status
description: As a customer, I want to see real-time updates on my application so that I know the progress of my request.
attributes_and_rules: Real-time status updates must be accurately reflected.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am a customer, When I submit an application, Then I can see real-time status updates on my dashboard.
test_cases: Given a customer, When they submit an application, Then the real-time status updates appear correctly on their dashboard.

title: Receive Email Notifications
description: As a customer, I want to receive email updates whenever the status of my application changes so that I stay informed.
attributes_and_rules: Email notifications must be timely and accurately reflect changes.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am a customer, When the status of my application changes, Then I receive an email notification reflecting the update.
test_cases: Given a customer, When the status of their application changes, Then an accurate email notification is received.

title: Secure Document Upload
description: As a customer, I want to securely upload required documents so that my requests can be processed efficiently.
attributes_and_rules: Document uploads must be secured with encryption.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am a customer, When I upload a document, Then it is securely transferred and stored.
test_cases: Given a customer, When they upload a document, Then the document upload is completed securely.

title: Document Validation
description: As a system, I want to validate uploaded documents for type and completeness so that only correct files are processed.
attributes_and_rules: Uploaded documents must be validated for correct type and completeness.
acceptance_criteria: Given an uploaded document, When it is processed, Then it is validated for type and completeness.
test_cases: Given an uploaded document, When it is processed, Then validation for correct type and completeness is performed.

title: Set Role Definitions and Permissions
description: As an administrator, I want to define separate roles and permissions so that users can only access the information relevant to them.
attributes_and_rules: Roles and permissions must be clearly defined and enforced.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am an administrator, When I define a role, Then I can assign appropriate permissions to it.
test_cases: Given an administrator, When they define a role, Then they can assign correct permissions to the role.

title: Apply Role Validation on Login
description: As a system, I want to enforce role validations during login so that unauthorized actions are prevented.
attributes_and_rules: Role validations must be performed during user login.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am a customer or staff, When I log in, Then my role permissions are validated and enforced.
test_cases: Given a customer or staff, When they log in, Then role permissions are correctly validated and enforced.

title: Synchronize Customer Data via APIs
description: As a system, I want to synchronize customer and account data with the core banking system so that user information is always up-to-date.
attributes_and_rules: Customer data synchronization with the core banking system must be seamless and accurate.
acceptance_criteria: Given new or updated customer data, When synchronization is performed, Then the core banking system reflects the correct, up-to-date data.
test_cases: Given new or updated customer data, When synchronization is performed, Then the core banking system data is accurately updated.

title: Handle Integration Failures Gracefully
description: As a system, I want to log and recover from integration errors so that services remain uninterrupted.
attributes_and_rules: Integration errors must be logged and handled without service interruption.
acceptance_criteria: Given an integration error, When it occurs, Then the system logs the error and continues to operate without interruption.
test_cases: Given an integration error, When it occurs, Then the error is correctly logged and the system remains functional.

title: Encrypt Sensitive Data
description: As a system, I want to encrypt sensitive user information so that data is secure both in transit and at rest.
attributes_and_rules: Sensitive user data must be encrypted in transit and at rest.
acceptance_criteria: Given sensitive data, When it is stored or transmitted, Then it is encrypted to ensure security.
test_cases: Given sensitive data, When it is stored or transmitted, Then encryption is applied correctly for security.

title: Maintain Audit Trail
description: As a customer, I want to view my past actions and service interactions so that I can track my digital banking history.
attributes_and_rules: Complete and accurate audit trails must be maintained for all user actions.
acceptance_criteria: Given I am a customer, When I access my audit trail, Then I can see a detailed log of my past actions and service interactions.
test_cases: Given a customer, When they access their audit trail, Then a complete and accurate log is presented.
